p: We focused our case study on areas of Swamp Oak, Casuarina glauca Sieber ex Spreng., woodland and forest dominated by Bangalay ( Eucalyptus botryoides Sm.). These areas of vegetation are characterised by shallow soils derived from Pleistocene (< 1.6 million year old) windblown sand dune systems, which cover Permian (~260 million year old) sandstone sequences [ 20].
